# createCommandInstance()

**Instance Method**

Creates and returns an instance of the command object described by the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func createCommandInstance() -> NSScriptCommand
```

## Return Value

The command object, instantiated from [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSScriptCommand] or a subclass.

## Creating Commands

- **createCommandInstance(with:)**: Creates and returns an instance of the command object described by the receiver in the specified memory zone.
